_source.short_desc: CMDB with comprehensive discovery and dependency mapping allows any company to control and manage change at an organizational level.
_source.long_desc: Harness Device42?s Change Management feature to plan your infrastructure change strategy. Device42?s powerful CMDB comprehensively discovers data, costs, and maps dependencies to limit disruption and accurately mitigate risk within your IT estate when managing change. Integrations with many popular ITSM solutions aid Change Management with custom-tailored workflows.
_source.pricing_details:
Pricing based on the number of devices and IP addresses:

1-100 Devices, 1-1k IP Addresses: $1499 per year
101-500 Devices, 1k-5k IP Addresses: $2999 per year
501-1000 Devices, 5k-10k IP Addresses: $4999 per year
1001-2500 Devices, 10-25k IP Addresses: $9999 per year
2500+ Devices, 25k+ IP Addresses: Request Quote
_source.target_audience: Data centers in excess of 2,000 square feet and more than 100 devices are entry-level candidates for Device42. Device42 scales to hundreds of thousands of devices, as well.

related_products.short_desc: Freshservice lets you plan, rollback changes at a few clicks and let relevant members evaluate and approve changes.
related_products.features: Freshservice is an online ITIL ready change management solution with a fresh twist. It puts a refreshing user experience on top of powerful ticketing and asset management capabilities, and is the most user-friendly app in the space.  In addition to core functionalities like Incident, Problem, Release and Asset Management, Freshservice also lets you put your knowledge base on the cloud.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
related_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

related_products.short_desc: Issuetrak helps you manage change requests and approvals, start to finish. Flexible, customizable, & easy to use. Cloud or on-premise.
related_products.features: Issuetrak provides change management software perfectly suited for the manufacturing and engineering industries. Need to document your manufacturing process, track preventive maintenance, or manage engineering change requests? We'll help you get the job done. Featuring easy management from anywhere; powerful automation tools for auto-assignment or escalating change requests; alerts and notifications when requests are submitted; task and workflow management; and so much more! Get started today.

related_products.short_desc: BOSSDesk is an award winning Help Desk / ITSM solution with Change Management and is available for both on the Cloud and On-Premise.
related_products.features: BOSSDesk Change Management process helps you collaborate as a team while getting buy-in from various stake holders through proper communication and approval process. BOSSDesk is a fully integrated ITIL based Service Desk/Help Desk and IT Asset Management solution available for both Cloud and On-Premise. It incorporates an award winning user-friendly interface and a powerful Service Catalog and is highly ranked by customers for providing an affordable ITSM solution and excellent customer support

related_products.short_desc: Alloy Navigator is a real-world solution beautifully designed for real-world customers, built by real-world IT people just like you.
related_products.features: Unexpected changes in an IT environment can both create major challenges and degrade services. Due to their critical nature, you'll want to ensure you create awareness, follow protective processes and track changes at the device level to ensure success. Alloy Navigator provides multi-stage approvals with Self-Service Portal support, Asset Intelligence and the flexible beauty of intelligent workflow to give you a complete IT solution.

related_products.short_desc: Establish a central repository for easily managing, tracking and processing all IT changes with ChangeGear by SunView Software.
related_products.features: Take your Change Management process to the next level! Deliver enterprise grade change management engineered for business agility. ChangeGear by Sunview Software uses advanced automation and controls to streamline the entire change and release management process.

related_products.short_desc: The Apple MAC of change management software in the cloud.
related_products.features: Standalone ITIL Change Management that is cloud based. Get up-and-running fast with Giva's out-of-the-box defaults to meet your organizational, regulatory and HIPAA compliance requirements. Dashboards, notifications and alerts keep everyone informed, enabling peer reviews and collaboration on new releases. Easily define ITIL processes to speed up approvals and manage the documentation. Gain visibility into code and configuration changes with Giva's central system of record for all IT changes.

related_products.short_desc: ESM supports beginner and advanced strategy practitioners.  Our STRATEGY, OKR, CYBER, and PERFORM modules stand alone or link together.
related_products.features:
ESM+STRATEGY empowers teams to formulate, track, and communicate their strategic plan. 

ESM+OKR leverages Objectives and Key Results to help organizations tactically get work done. 

ESM+CYBER enables organizations to manage risk, compliance, and cyber security. 

ESM+PERFORM empowers employees to link goals to the organizational strategy. 

With automated Balanced Scorecards, strategy maps, dashboards, and instant reports, ESM brings strategy to life.

related_products.short_desc: IdeaScale is innovation management software that uses crowdsourcing to gather ideas and develop them into a new product or process.
related_products.features: IdeaScale is the largest cloud-based innovation software platform in the world with more than 25,000 customers and 4.5 million users. The software allows organizations to involve the public and employees in decisions by collecting their ideas and giving users a platform to vote. The ideas are then evaluated, routed, and implemented, making IdeaScale the engine of crowd-powered innovation. IdeaScales client roster includes industry leaders, such as the White House, Cisco, and many others.

related_products.short_desc: Integrated into your SaaS applications, Lemon Learning personalized walkthroughs drive software adoption and users engagement.
related_products.features: Is it time to implement new tools and business processes within your organization? Lemon Learning supports your teams towards better use of their everyday applications, thanks to interactive guides integrated into your software (Salesforce, Workday, Infor, SAP, Oracle, etc.). The benefit? Better tools, more engaged and productive users, and dramatically reduced support costs.

related_products.short_desc: Intelligent Service Management is a robust, full-featured service management suite aided by Luma the Virtual Support Agent with AI.
related_products.features: Intelligent Service Management is a robust, full-featured service management suite thats simple, affordable and aided by Luma  the Virtual Support Agent with Artificial Intelligence. The solution reduces support efforts and improves the end user experience. With the help of codeless configuration and drag-and-drop service automation, customization is easy, and administration is minimal. Lumas AI based conversational interface understands the users intent, ensuring requests are actionable.

similar_products.short_desc: See what will break, what to fix and how to test it, so your business can move forward without having to take any steps backwards.
similar_products.features:
Any change to your ERP or CRM system will have a downstream impact on multiple business processes. 

By using Change Management, Test Intelligence technology, and advanced automation, Panaya shows you exactly what will break, what you need to fix, and how to test this, so your business can move forward without having to take any steps backward. Panaya introduces an end-to-end business process testing approach to test management with Panaya Test Dynamix, a cloud-based smart testing platform.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top CMDB software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of CMDB tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: CMDB, or Configuration Management Database software, is a repository of data about IT assets.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top ITSM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of ITSM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: ITSM software, also known as Information Technology Service Management software, focuses on management of internal and external IT support. These applications guide IT organizations through the planning, design, development, delivery, and support of their services. ITSM solutions encompass such areas as Help Desk and IT Service.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Quality Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Quality Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Quality Management software automates the process of tracking and minimizing product defects. Organizations use these applications to monitor and control product quality. Through the collection and analysis of data from users, organizations can identify, isolate and correct unforeseen product defects or other issues that may emerge in the course of production. Quality Management solutions also provide tools to evaluate the effectiveness of notification campaigns, recalls and repair attempts. QMS also aids in maintaining product compliance with applicable international regulations. Quality Management software is related to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software and Product Lifecycle Management software.

_source.short_desc: ITAM Software: Track complete hardware & software asset life-cycles, licenses, contracts, certificates, renewal reminders, and more!
_source.long_desc: Device42 is the most comprehensive discovery system for Hybrid IT available today. Continuously discover, map, and optimize infrastructure and applications across data center and cloud environments. Device42 intelligently groups discovered workloads by application affinities, dramatically reducing the effort required to create move groups, capturing all communications. Customers across 60 countries use these capabilities to manage and modernize their IT infrastructure and application landscapes.

category_features.name: Audit Management
category_features.definition: Plan, schedule and execute organization's accounts and assets to ensure they all comply with policies, laws, and requirements.

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Configuration Management
category_features.definition: Identify and maintain components (i.e. servers, configuration information, software, etc.) and their relationships across all service

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and maintain contracts/licenses that come with procured products or services to ensure they are adhered to

category_features.name: Cost Tracking
category_features.definition: Record and monitor cost related information of assets (i.e. budget for assets, equipment costs, revenues, etc.)

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Maintenance Management
category_features.definition: Assess and plan maintenance operations and updates to ensure longevity of physical assets

category_features.name: Procurement Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage all processes/procedures involved in purchasing goods and/or services

category_features.name: Requisition Management
category_features.definition: Review, approve and cancel requests for goods/services to be purchased

category_features.name: Supplier Management
category_features.definition: Manage various aspects of the relationship with suppliers (e.g. interactions, history)

category_features.name: Change Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor efficient handling of all IT service changes/transitions

category_features.name: Configuration Management
category_features.definition: Identify and maintain components (i.e. servers, configuration information, software, etc.) and their relationships across all service

category_features.name: Data Visualization
category_features.definition: Graphical representation of the data

category_features.name: Device Auto Discovery
category_features.definition: Periodically scan the network for external services and take pre-defined actions upon discovery

category_features.name: IT Asset Management
category_features.definition: Inventories and tracks changes to hardware and software configurations

category_features.name: Impact Management
category_features.definition: Analysis of impact/effect on IT services and other business processes

category_features.name: License Management
category_features.definition: Track and organize the number of licenses available to the organization

category_features.name: Performance Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitoring and measurement of relevant metrics to assess the performance of IT resources

category_features.name: Relationship Mapping
category_features.definition: Creating relationships between different IT assets to define their status and dependencies in a network

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Capacity Management
category_features.definition: Monitor/analyze service demand and performance to plan for adequate resources to meet current/future business requirements

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: IT Reporting
category_features.definition: Assemble and deliver relevant data points for IT

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Issue Auditing
category_features.definition: Track and monitor past issues and issue changes

category_features.name: License Management
category_features.definition: Track and organize the number of licenses available to the organization

category_features.name: Maintenance Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule predetermined or ad hoc maintenance services and labor requests

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipments, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Availability Management
category_features.definition: Monitor and analyze availability issues to help design and plan the improvement of service availability

category_features.name: Change Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor efficient handling of all IT service changes/transitions

category_features.name: Configuration Management
category_features.definition: Identify and maintain components (i.e. servers, configuration information, software, etc.) and their relationships across all service

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and maintain contracts/licenses that come with procured products or services to ensure they are adhered to

category_features.name: Incident Management
category_features.definition: Identify, resolve and restore unplanned service failures/disruptions or injuries

category_features.name: Problem Management
category_features.definition: Identify and solve underlying cause of incident(s), and prevent future incidents from occurring

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Release Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate the testing/deployment of IT service releases (i.e. service changes)

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Color Codes/Icons
category_features.definition: Assign color coding and icons

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Device Auto Discovery
category_features.definition: Periodically scan the network for external services and take pre-defined actions upon discovery

category_features.name: Hierarchical Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model in which the network map is organized and visualized as a tree-like structure

category_features.name: Location-Based Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model based on the geographic location of users

category_features.name: Map Exporting
category_features.definition: Export a map or layout to share

category_features.name: On-Demand Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model where users create their own map using data they specify

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self-Updating Maps
category_features.definition: Dynamic maps that update whenever network changes are made

related_products.short_desc: Rippling makes it easy to manage your Payroll, Benefits, HR, and IT -- all in one, modern platform.
related_products.features:
Rippling makes it easy to manage your company's Payroll, Benefits, HR, and IT -- all in one, modern platform. It brings all of your employee systems and data together, and helps automate your busy work.

Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can just click a button, and in 90 seconds set up a new hires payroll, health insurance, 401K, work computer, and apps  like Slack, Zoom, and Office 365.

related_products.short_desc: Learn why Forbes rated Asset Panda the #1 Asset Tracking Software of 2022. Try Asset Panda with a free 14-day trial (no card required)!
related_products.features: Our IT asset management software helps you streamline managing your entire IT asset lifecycle. Our cloud-based ITAM software is flexible, user-friendly, customizable, and supports many integrations. The software pairs with mobile iOS & Android apps with free barcode scanning. On top of IT asset management, we help with ticketing, fixed asset audits, maintenance tracking, auto-discovery, equipment tracking, & more. Get your free 14-day trial today (no card required)!

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first IT Asset Management Solution to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's IT Asset Management Software is a modern maintenance and asset management solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before.

related_products.short_desc: IT Asset Management has never been more important than in today's remote environment. Integrates seamlessly with Zendesk, Jira etc.
related_products.features: Manage the complete IT asset lifecycle for your remote workforce with easy-to-use, cloud-based IT Asset Management software. Reduce downtime, ensure software license compliance, and speed up troubleshooting by tracking all hardware including Windows/Mac devices as well as software. Maintain complete visibility into your IT landscape with full asset management, purchase orders, maintenance, usage optimization. Seamlessly integrated with Zendesk, Jira helpdesks, as well as SCCM, JAMF, many others.

related_products.short_desc: Fishbowl's IT Asset Management solution benefits from real-time data so you know exactly what your manufacturing assets are worth.
related_products.features: Fishbowl's IT Asset Management solution takes the guesswork out of determining what your manufacturing assets are worth. You will no longer rely solely on estimates and guesses about when to reorder, because you will have real-time data that gives you an accurate reflection of what is in stock at all times.

related_products.short_desc: SolarWinds Service Desk provides fully integrated asset management and service management for IT teams to resolve issues quickly
related_products.features: SolarWinds Service Desk is a fully integrated IT service desk and IT asset management solution. Easily track, monitor, and analyze your assets, including hardware, software, contracts, purchase orders, licenses, and warranties all in one place. Automatically scan your network to discover and update asset data. Streamline ticket resolution by aligning incidents to impacted assets, automatically capturing asset incident history, and automating ticket routing and priority using AI.

related_products.short_desc: Download free IT help desk software for IT pros & sysadmins around the world in all businesses. Support & mobile apps also free.
related_products.features: The Spiceworks IT Help Desk is purpose-built for IT pros, we have just what you need to run a better internal IT help desk and a better business. Start tackling tickets in minutes with free help desk software (on your server or in the cloud). Plus, it's more than just ticket tracking: understand (and change!) team behavior and articulate your value to the business. Get it free today!

related_products.short_desc: A complete Mobile Device Management solution for IT pros to simplify the deployment, inventory, and security of Apple devices.
related_products.features: Jamf Pro is a complete device management solution for IT pros to simplify the deployment, inventory and security of Macs, iPads, iPhones and Apple TVs. Designed to automate device management while driving end-user productivity, Jamf Pro is the EMM tool that delights IT pros and the users they support by delivering on the promise of unified endpoint management for Apple devices. The IT experience you want is within reach. Request a free trial and become an IT superhero today.

related_products.features: Maintain inventory of your organization's IT and non-IT assets like contracts, hardware, software, and track asset details throughout its lifecycle with Freshservice's asset management. The tool puts a refreshing user experience on top of powerful ticketing and asset management capabilities like auto-discovery of new resources, powerful configuration management, and enhanced impact analysis.

related_products.short_desc: SysAid helps IT work smarter, not harder, with service automation based on a decade of AI information. Try IT for free today.
related_products.features:
SysAid uses service automation to make IT work smarter, not harder. With a help desk that practically manages itself, millions of users around the world enjoy faster service, lighter workloads, and a way smoother service experience. 
And with built-in Asset Management, you get digital inventory made easy. Manage all your IT assets directly within your service desk, and resolve issues faster with all the asset data and records you need already inside each ticket.
Try IT for free today

similar_products.short_desc: A customizable and full featured asset tracking platform. Easy to setup and use. Cloud based and mobile. World-class support.
similar_products.features: Specialized for Schools and IT departments. Reftab costs a fraction of the cost of the others with a better UI and the same, powerful features. We know you need a simple platform. Anyone, no matter their requirements or technical ability can use Reftab for a robust asset management platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Compile data, audit and manage workstations, servers, printers, routers and mobile devices. Group by OS, application or location.
similar_products.features: The ConnectWise Automate, formerly LabTech, remote monitoring and management (RMM) platform will enable you to find, repair and maintain your clients IT assets remotely through a single interface, as well as automate redundant tasks and proactively resolve issues before they become full-blown problems. See for yourself, start your free trial!

similar_products.short_desc: Help desk support software and asset management tool includes, knowledgebase, SLA management, ticket tracking, inventory management.
similar_products.features: ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus is a Help Desk and Asset Management Software. It offers an Integrated Package with Incident Management(Trouble Ticketing), Asset Tracking, Purchasing, Contract Management, Self-Service Portal, and Knowledge Base at an Affordable Price Point. ServiceDesk Plus provides all that you need to have a Full-Fledged IT Help Desk and a Productive Help Desk Staff. ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus is available in both On-Premise and On-Demand.

similar_products.short_desc: IT Glue is an award-winning documentation platform, helping IT providers dramatically reduce wasted time looking for information.
similar_products.features: IT Glue is an IT documentation software for MSPs, co-managed IT teams, as well as IT departments. Get relationship mapping, secure password management, and an automated and structured documentation framework to organize all your information. Have confidence in the security of your information with features like granular access permissions, version history, and more. Track any asset with ease for peace of mind, including expiries and vendor information.

similar_products.short_desc: SummitAI IT asset and service management solutions help you effectively respond to your rapidly growing and changing technology needs.
similar_products.features: Symphony SummitAI is an enterprise-class ITSM and ITAM solution that effortlessly brings service and asset management together in one platform with AI-driven knowledge intelligence. SummitAI's asset management solution helps you manage the IT asset lifecycle from procurement to disposal, control spend with software license governance and compliance, and eliminates overbuying by helping right-size future purchase of hardware and software.

similar_products.short_desc: SAO enables users to visualize and analyze global software inventories and utilization rates.
similar_products.features:
SAO enables you to visualize and analyze global software inventories and utilization rates across facilities, divisions, departments, and users. 

With SAO, it's easy to pinpoint underutilized assets for better business planning and forecasting. Because we have deep domain expertise in not only HPC but also business analytics and software licensing systems, Altair is uniquely qualified to offer powerful SAO solutions tailored to the unique requirements of each organization.

similar_products.short_desc: SysTrack is an IT asset management solution for IT teams to have clear visibility into their environments and end-user experience.
similar_products.features: IT Asset management solution that gathers and analyzes data on everything that may impact end-user experience and business productivity. Directly from the workspace, SysTrack captures data such as CPU, RAM, memory, and other 10,000+ data points. These are then analyzed by SysTrack and used by IT in countless ways that lower costs and optimize operations including: lowering the amount of help desk tickets, identifying over and under-provisioning, reducing MTTR and more!

similar_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
similar_products.features: JumpCloud is an open directory platform for secure, frictionless access from any device to any resource, anywhere. JumpClouds mission is to Make Work Happen, providing simple, secure access to corporate technology resources from any device, or any location. The JumpCloud Directory Platform gives IT, MSPs, VARs/Distributors, security operations, and DevOps a single, cloud-based solution to control and manage employee identities, their devices, and apply Zero Trust principles.

similar_products.short_desc: NinjaOne gives complete, accurate, and real-time insight into managed IT assets to help IT teams reduce costs, & make better decision.
similar_products.features: NinjaOne gives complete, accurate, and real-time data and insight into managed IT assets. With Ninja, IT leaders get full visibility into and control over their endpoints, insights and automation to reduce technology costs, robust monitoring and more. NinjaOne makes asset discovery easy through Active Directory based discovery and deployment, improves decision-making with real-time IT asset information, tools to group, find, and manage assets more efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Alloy Navigator is a real-world solution beautifully designed for real-world customers, built by real-world IT people just like you.
similar_products.features: Ensuring assets are accounted for is critical for any IT organization. That's why we designed Alloy Navigator to keep you financially and contractually sound with a strong set of depreciation and auditing tools. Our loan center ensures easy borrowing while consumable stock management is a breeze. Couple that with the flexible beauty of intelligent workflow and you have a complete IT solution.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fixed Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fixed Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fixed Asset Management software is designed to track the MRO lifecycle and maintain depreciation values on assets such as land, buildings, motor vehicles, furniture, office equipment, computers, and other items, which cannot easily be turned into cash. This type of software can help any size company convert from spreadsheet record-keeping to streamlined reporting of fixed asset depreciation and is a good fit for companies that need to be valued for tax or acquisition purposes. Fixed Asset Management software is related to Accounting software, IT Asset Management software, Inventory Control software, and Inventory Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Monitoring and Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Monitoring and Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Monitoring and Management or RMM software is widely used by managed services providers to perform monitoring, maintenance and troubleshooting for their clients' IT systems.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top SaaS Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of SaaS Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: SaaS Management software provides centralized monitoring and management of dispersed SaaS applications across the organization, as well as tracking and control of SaaS subscriptions and all associated costs.
